data.title: Maria Josefa Ramona Macrimiana (Bandini) Carrillo (1823-)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Josefa (Bandini) Carrillo born 1823 San Diego, Alta California including ancestors + descendants + 1 photos + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors Descendants

Died [date unknown] [location unknown]

Profile last modified 13 Dec 2023 | Created 11 Jun 2017

This page has been accessed 435 times.

Biography

Josefa was born in 1823. Josefa Bandini was the daughter of Juan Bandini and Maria Dolores Estudillo[1]

This person was in a record in 23 August 1823.[2]

In the 1850 census Josefa (age 26) was in Santa Barbara, Santa Barbara, California.[3]

In the 1860 census Josefa (age 36) was in Santa Barbara Township, Santa Barbara, California.[4]

In the 1870 census Josefa (age 46) was in Los Angeles, Los Angeles, California.[5] She inherited (with her children) 18 lots of land in "old Town, San Diego, California and La Playa, San Diego county in the will of Abel Stearns in 1871.[6] In the 1880 census Josefa (age 58), Keeping House, was the wife of Padro Carilla in Los Angeles, Los Angeles, California.[7]

Josefa died (age 73) on 5 April 1896 in Los Angeles, Los Angeles, California.[8][9][10]

Josefa died on 5 April 1896 and was buried in Santa Monica, Los Angeles, California.[11][12] She was in an obituary on 10 April 1896 in San Diego, California.[13] She was in another obituary on 16 April 1896 in San Diego, California. She died (age 72) on 12 April 1896.[14]
